p: Complaint filed charging the defendant with Vagrancy warrant issued and placed in the hands of JG Robinson who returns the same and brings the defendant in Court and after hearing the complaint read plead guilty as charged JG Robinson sworn and the Court being satisfied in the matter. As therefore ordered and adjudged by the Court that the defendant Mary ONeil should give a bond of $200.00 with good security for her good behavior for the term of three months and that she be committed to the County Jail until such bond with good security was found unless she be discharged by due process of law
